plot: The life of a grieving and self-conflicted young man that lives in seclusion, is interrupted by the arrival of a cynical, aged man that questions his beliefs.
title: Back of Beyond
plot_es: The life of a grieving and self-conflicted young man that lives in seclusion, is interrupted by the arrival of a cynical, aged man that questions his beliefs.
plot_en: The life of a grieving and self-conflicted young man that lives in seclusion, is interrupted by the arrival of a cynical, aged man that questions his beliefs.
